title: Short-Intensive Course on Web-Based Language Instructional Material Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational language education concepts
context.additional_context: Systematic acquisition of web-based instructional material design processes in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Independently design language teaching materials by applying the four stages of the systematic instructional design process: analysis, design, development, and implementation.
Implement three or more language teaching strategies that enhance learner engagement using web-based tools.
Ensure coherence and systematicity in teaching materials using only a smartphone, even in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
